message.content: {"id": "17423", "title": "Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.", "description": "There are two Revert options in the menu.", "OB": "I open a java editor. Upon inspection, I noticed that the Revert option was disabled, as it should be. To reproduce the bug: 1) Make the editor dirty. 2) Popup the menu.", "SR": "Build F1. 1) Open a java editor. 2) Popup the menu. One Revert option appears after UNDO, and the other Revert option appears before FORMAT."}
